EmailTemplate.subject: You are cordially invited to the exclusive preview of the latest RIMOWA Mars and Mercury collection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
I hope you’re doing well.
I’m pleased to invite you to an exclusive preview of the Mars and Mercury collection at our RIMOWA {Store name} store.
As our valued guest, you’ll have first access to preview and pre-order the latest collection. Additionally, we are pleased to offer a complimentary Year of the Ox personalization service in-store in celebration of the Lunar New Year.
To ensure your health and safety, we are offering 1-on-1 appointments from Jan 25th to Feb 3rd. Should you need more details or wish to book your appointment, I would be happy to assist you.
Looking forward to hearing from you!
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
